english_example_sentence: If you had suggested this beautiful idea, everyone would have accepted it.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы ты предложил эту прекрасную идею, все бы ее приняли.
turkish_example_sentence: Sen bu güzel fikri önermişsen, herkes kabul ederdi.
